attributes.action: examine all claiments of all benefits who are especially claiming for Living Dissability Allowance even after they have had corrective treatment for their previous illness and no longer need any medication for it
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: it is a fact that some claiments are still receiving Living Dissability Allowance payments who no longer have the illness for which this payment was designed for..if these people who have had treatment and are no longer on any medication for the illness why then should they be paid for an illness that no longer exists?
